invention-title: Method for decomposing combustible gas into hydrogen and carbon
一种将可燃气体分解成氢气和碳的方法

abstract.p: The invention discloses a method for decomposing combustible gas into hydrogen and carbon, which comprises the following steps of: inputting high temperature and high heat which are generated by a heat energy generation device and have the temperature of greater than or equal to 3000 DEG C together with combustible gas from one end of a reaction furnace, and performing chemical reaction on the combustible gas in the reaction furnace to decompose the combustible gas into hydrogen and carbon, and the hydrogen and the carbon are output from the other end of the reaction furnace in the form of a gas-solid mixture. The heat energy generating device is a microwave generating unit and a microwave receiving unit, or the heat energy generating device is a radio frequency generating unit and a radio frequency receiving unit, or the heat energy generating device is a high-frequency high-voltage current generating device. According to the method, the combustible gas is directly decomposed into hydrogen and carbon at the temperature larger than or equal to 3000 DEG C, no other by-products are generated in the reaction process, pollution to the environment is avoided, economic benefits are improved, and cost is reduced.

本发明公开了一种将可燃气体分解成氢气和碳的方法，包括：将热能生成装置生成的温度大于等于3000°的高温高热与可燃气体共同从反应炉的一端输入，所述可燃气体在反应炉中发生化学反应分解生成氢气和碳，所述氢气和碳以气固混合体的形式从所述反应炉的另一端输出。热能生成装置为微波发生单元及微波接收单元，或者所述热能生成装置为射频发生单元和射频接收单元，或者为高频高压电流生成装置。本方法使可燃气体在大于等于3000°的温度下直接分解成氢气和碳，反应过程中并无其他副产物产生，不会对环境造成污染，提高了经济效益，降低了成本。
